sys_ux_client_script.name: Set Quiz State Vars

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_980ea0af47373550638eaa42736d430f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3dd49f8f47ffb150638eaa42736d43fa</macroponent><name>Set Quiz State Vars</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api : {setState, state, data, context : {props}}, event, helpers, imports}) {
    console.log("SET QUIZ STATE VARS");
    const quizInstance = data.quiz_instance.output.data.xSncQuiznow.quizifier.getQuizInstanceByAccessCode;
    if(!quizInstance) { return; }

    if(state.quizInstance.id != quizInstance.id){
        setState("quizInstance", quizInstance);
    }

    const questions = quizInstance.quiz.questions;
    setState("questions", questions);

    if(!props.question){
        setState("currentQuestion", null);
    } else {
        const currentQuestion = questions[props.question-1];
        setState("currentQuestion", currentQuestion);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jon.lind</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-24 22:19:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>980ea0af47373550638eaa42736d430f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Quiz State Vars</sys_name><sys_package display_value="QuizNow" source="x_snc_quiznow">2994605e478a7510741c9fe4126d43b7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="QuizNow">2994605e478a7510741c9fe4126d43b7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_980ea0af47373550638eaa42736d430f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jon.lind</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 22:19:22</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
